org.ops4j.peaberry
Class Peaberry

java.lang.Object
  org.ops4j.peaberry.Peaberry

public final class Peaberry
extends java.lang.Object

Guice extension that supports injection of dynamic services.

Method Summary
static void nonDelegatingContainer()
          Enable support for using Guice in non-delegating containers, such as OSGi, both in the current thread and any threads created by it after this point.

          Creates a Guice module for an OSGi bundle, with bindings to the given BundleContext and OSGi ServiceRegistry, as well as a BindingFactory that will automatically bind injection points annotated with Service to matching OSGi services.

serviceProvider

public static <T> Provider<T> serviceProvider(ServiceRegistry registry,
                                              java.lang.Class<? extends T> target)
Creates a dynamic service provider for the given ServiceRegistry. The provider is configured to find all services compatible with the target.

Parameters:
registry - dynamic service registry
target - current binding target
Returns:
dynamic service provider

osgiServiceRegistry

public static ServiceRegistry osgiServiceRegistry(BundleContext bundleContext)
Creates a new OSGi ServiceRegistry adaptor for the given bundle.

Parameters:

Returns:
OSGi specific ServiceRegistry

nonDelegatingContainer

public static void nonDelegatingContainer()
Enable support for using Guice in non-delegating containers, such as OSGi, both in the current thread and any threads created by it after this point.

osgiModule

public static Module osgiModule(BundleContext bundleContext)
Creates a Guice module for an OSGi bundle, with bindings to the given BundleContext and OSGi ServiceRegistry, as well as a BindingFactory that will automatically bind injection points annotated with Service to matching OSGi services. An OSGi classloader hook is also set for the thread using this module.

Parameters:
bundleContext - current bundle context
Returns:
OSGi service injection rules
